title: 14 day ban first offense for 2 games of toxic chat?
body:
I recently just got banned on my level 14 account for 14 days after 2 games of toxic chat, I have never been banned in the 2 and almost a half years I've played this game,

To clarify, I am not saying I was unfairly punished, I said the N word 3 times, (note I have never said it on any of my other accounts till this 1 game) 
And I agree I should be punished for it, but a straight up 14 day ban? For 2 games? at most I was expecting a chat restric/ban, I did not even int, troll, or grief, only thing I did was chat related, why am I restricted from playing the game as a whole on this account, for 2 weeks? 

Even if there is more supporting my 14 day ban than just toxic chat, I'd like to know, I feel like a 14 day ban is a little overboard for 2 games of being a crapbasket in chat,

replies.body: Yeah, racism will net you a 14 day ban with no prior punishments.

> thats weird, but alright

It's not actually that weird. If you went into a coffee shop, a restaurant, or a movie theater and you started using racist language and disrupting the other customers with it, you would be asked to leave. If your  friends find that behavior acceptable, that's fine, but you should leave it in other chat programs. Using it in League chat where others can see it is the equivalent of saying it loudly enough that other patrons at the movie theater are forced to experience the racist content of your speech. It's really just not okay.
Ya but they have chat bans/restrictions for chat related offences, that is whats weird about it I mean

Riot has a zero tolerance policy for anything they consider to be hate speech. Using hate speech (or telling people to kill themselves) skips the two chat bans and goes straight to a two week suspension.

Keep in mind that ANY negativity after this can get you a permaban. Even a little passive aggressive talk.
So basically what you're saying, is after the ban just do /ignore all every game for 6 months when its ok to talk again, alright

Post your logs. Or don't, since we all already know you were either racist, sexist, homophobic, or otherwise used derogatory terms, or told someone to commit suicide.

never told anyone to kill themselves, Im not homophobic or racist, and the twitch/lux were also saying the N word, and we never used it as a hate comment but more of a joking manner, Still dont think its worth a 14 day ban,

It would just be a permban on first offense in a lot of games and communities, but riot gives people a warning. Dont waste it.

Remember, you cant beat trash at their own game.

Riot are thieves who want to ban people to steal their stuff.  Or that is sure how it seems when I go through the 15 or so threads on this exact topic today.  So many people who sit on their high horses and act like they've never made a poor decision and done something they regret.  In this case what the cat did was say a bad word a few times...a bad word...its a word...it's air.  Now words have power, but only when people allow them power.  He knows what he said was wrong, he just would like you to understand that it's his first offense and therefore maybe you should use some actual human judgement and not a bot on the situation before banning the cat from something he clearly enjoys for two weeks.
